data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Makedonska Kamenica, North Macedonia. Please, stir the 9 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Makedonska Kamenica, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 9 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 577 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Makedonska Kamenica unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Makedonska Kamenica, North Macedonia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Albanian, Macedonian people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, help every believer in Makedonska Kamenica, North Macedonia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Over 38.03 percent of the people of Makedonska Kamenica are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.section_summary:
the state of Makedonska Kamenica, North Macedonia has a population of 5,200.

We estimate Makedonska Kamenica has 9 people who might know Jesus, 3,214 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,977 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 577 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Makedonska Kamenica who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
